items.sentence: Tom was drunk and he said some things he shouldn\'t have.
Tom was supposed to come with us, but he didn\'t show up.
Tom knows everything there is to know about Italian cars.
Tom learned how to ride a bicycle from his older brother.
Tom lives in a small town where nobody locks their doors.
Tom looked in the yellow pages to find a used car dealer.
I thought I saw Tom in the park, but it was someone else.
Do you have any idea where Tom might\'ve left his camera?
French is too hard, so I don\'t think I want to learn it.
He hurried to the station so he wouldn\'t miss the train.
I didn\'t know that Tom didn\'t know how to speak French.
I didn\'t know that Tom said he wasn\'t going to do that.
I haven\'t done any of the things you\'ve asked me to do.
I honestly didn\'t know that Tom didn\'t know any French.
I lived in a three-room apartment when I lived in Boston.
I need to find somebody who can babysit on Friday nights.
I need to talk to you about what happened here last week.
I need you to go to the post office and mail this letter.
Tom and Mary are both thirty, but they look much younger.
Tom and Mary fell in love with each other at first sight.
